overview: Bulit, an 8-year-old boy with ASD (Autism Spectrum Disorder) discovers that nature can communicate with him. Three daisies ask him for help: a cyclone arrives that will devastate the forest and the town. Nobody pays attention to Bulit except her friends, Karmelia and Witib. Together, with the GREAT GIFT of Bulit, they manage to find a solution.
title: Bulit escucha a la naturaleza
